name: 趙莊敏
objective: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對購併相關議題有確實的瞭解，包括1.合併的動機與理論介紹，2.購併的型態與策略規畫，3.公司購併時的法律規畫4.美、日、歐金融控股公司發展與比較，5.美國與日本銀行購併案例之探討6.金融控股公司相關議題，7.合併後之相關整合規畫等
schedule:
週次　　授  課  內  容  要  項
1 合併動機與理論介紹
2 合併與收購的型態
3 購併前的策略規畫
4 公司購併的法律規畫
5 金融機構合併時相關規範
6 Strategic Processes of M&As + 案例
7 Theories of Mergers and Tender Offers +案例
8 The Timing of Merger Activity + 案例
9 Midterm Exam Week
10 Empirical Tests of M&A Performance +案例　　
11 Alternative Approaches to Valuation
   Increasing the Value of the Organization
12 Corporate Restructuring and Divestitures + 案例
13 Empirical Tests of Corporate Restructuring and Divestitures +案例
14 Paper presentation and discussion
15 Paper presentation and discussion
16 Paper presentation and discussion
17 Paper presentation and discussion
18 Final Exam Week
scorePolicy:
課東章節報告 30%
案例報告 30%
論文選讀 40%
materials: ”Takeovers, Restructuring, and Corporate Governance”, by J. Fred Weston, Mark L. Mitchell, and J. Harold Mulherin, 4th ed.，雙葉書廊
